inn1.comm: starts on a length on off right away, holds its line a touch and he defends on the off side
gets it to move in from a length again but sends it down leg
gets the line right this time, around off and straightening, he gets forward to block

direct hit and he was gone, Tamim played the ball towards midwicket and took a few steps out, Kayes set off as well, midwicket got to the ball with a dive and fired in the throw, Mpofu was not around to take it, and it missed the stumps with Kayes well short, he could not have got back in time after running halfway up the track
blocked down the track
slowish one on the pads tickled through square leg
keeping it tight around off, that is the way to go on this flat track, defended back to the bowler
gentle full delivery floated well wide of the batsman who gets out towards it and crashes it through extra cover
coming in from back of a length on the pads, strictly gentle medium pace, tucked away to long leg
going away from the left-hander after pitching outside leg stump, sharp movement for Meth, he is struck on the pad
again he gets it to shape away from the left-hander, fuller length, and he drives with a straight bat down the ground, mid on gets to it with a dive
he's got that movement going away from the left-hander, who gets a thickish edge towards point as he pushes at it
touch more on this away going delivery from Meth, good carry through to Taibu as he lets it go past
Mpofu has started well, hasn't deviated much from a tight line around off, defends towards mid on
again holding its line around that middle and off line, he shuffles across and blocks
just a bit of width from back of a length, he stands in the crease and tries to thump it through point, mistimes it

that has got to be close, Mpofu puts more effort in a fuller delivery that pitched around leg stump and started to come in, umpire Dharmasena ignores Mpofu's fervent appeal for lbw, looked like going down leg
angled across the left-hander just outside off, he shuffles across and keeps it down
moving away a shade from a length on middle, opens the face and gets it towards point
swinging away from the left-hander, starting around leg and ending up just outside off very full, he gets towards the pitch and pushes towards cover
another one swinging away outside off, he gets towards it and opens the face to push to point
now it holds its line around middle and leg, tucked away to long leg
moving away from outside leg stump, he nudges it behind square leg
he is getting consistent away movement from the left-handers, they have to be cautious they get behind it and cover for it while pushing on the off side
fuller now on the stumps, crouches out and pushes back to the bowler
too straight on middle and leg, tucked behind square leg

pushes a full delivery hard in to the track and it bounces over the bowler, who takes some pace off it, mid on dives over the ball, mid off scrambles after it, gets in to a tangle with the dive but manages to stop it in the end
still fuller and a bit of width, crunched off the front foot, straight to cover
nudged towards square leg for a single
more width this time and he cracks it off the back foot, Sibanda stops it at point and it rolls towards cover
glides it past Sibanda at point and third man gets around to it, Mpofu offering some width in this over
this one straightens after being angled fullish across the left-hander, he goes for the extra cover drive but gets an inside edge on the leg side
shaping away from outside leg stump, he plays it towards midwicket
again moving away, but from well outside leg stump, he could cause a lot of trouble if that line was around middle and off, played out towards square leg
angled across on a length outside off stump, gets forward and pushes to mid off for a single
length ball played out towards midwicket
angles it in on a length, not much movement and he nudges it towards midwicket
fires it in fullish outside off stump, he gets forward and pushes towards mid on
tries to force him with the angle past midwicket but cannot get it past that man
well done, comes well forward and pushes wide of mid off for a quick single
gets it to the left of mid on with the angle, and waits for an instant before deciding the single is on and rushing across
there is a man at a leg gully position, and Tamim's swings a shortish one on a leg straight to him
tucked with the angle towards deep backward square leg, not much happening for Mpofu with the ball
that could have been stopped, mid off ran to his left but dived late as Tamim forced a full delivery past him
moving away but starting outside leg again, whipped wristily through square leg
Kayes decides to go down the ground, but does not time it well at all, got too much under the fullish one and got it just over mid on
full delivery forced down the ground to long on
worked with the angle from a length to midwicket
well run, pushes in front of mid on and scampers through for the single
too short from Mpofu from round the stumps, goes high over the batsman who bends the knee and goes under it
pushed towards gully from the crease
pushes off the front foot towards point, wants the single, but has to go back
good delivery, angled in fullish close to off stump, he gets front foot out and blocks

dropped, that is not on on this placid wicket, Taibu has put down a sharp chance, Kayes went hard as he saw a bit of width outside off stump, the edge flew to Taibu's left, slip was wide and Taibu lunged at it, got his gloves to it but parried it past slip
tucked towards midwicket with the angle
pushed off the front foot on the off side
floats it full on the off stump, he crouches forward to push it towards mid on

Meth has struck, that is a lovely delivery, the angle from round the stumps has worked, angled in on a fullish length just outside off, he has to play at it, but it moves away to take the edge and this time Taibu holds on
pushes forward to a full ball and gets it in front of mid on, direct hit and he was in trouble, but he missed, the backing up was not great as well
fullish and well wide outside off stump from Meth, and Tamim does not need any more invitation, gets forward and smashes it in the air over backward point
and another one, overpitched and he takes toll, goes forward and drives through covers, not much of a gap there but he splits it
uses the angle to push for a single in front of mid on

tucked in front of square leg off the pads, there is a huge misunderstading, as he rushes back halfway up the wicket for the second, Ashraful has not budged, but the throw is at the keeper's end and he is able to get back
full and wide enough for Ashraful to come forward and crash it to sweeper cover
tight length but wrong line, on the pads and worked through square leg
fuller and close to off stump, he is forward to smother it in defence

poor delivery, full and too wide outside off stump, Ashraful will go after those any day, off the middle of the bat and wide of sweeper cover who dives and gets a hand to it, but it trickles in to the boundary
well bowled this time, angled in close enough to off make him push forward and get beaten
this is just fodder for Tamim, at that harmless pace, Meth floats it full and in Tamim's slot outside off, he smashes it past extra cover
dabbed straight to short third man, Ashraful wants the single now but has to go back
drives another full delivery with a straight bat down to long on
well bowled, length delivery close to off stump, he pushes forward bat and pad together
floated full outside off stump but Ashraful's firm push finds mid off, not much movement now for Meth
gets on top of a length ball, pushes it off the high part of the bat towards cover
angles it across him from wide of the crease, he steers from close to the body to third man
nicely bowled, he troubles Ashraful again with that angled delivery outside off stump, it takes off from short of a length, and Ashraful has a poke at it from the crease, beaten
pushed towards point off the front foot now
tries to go hard for the extra cover drive, mistimes it to mid on
shuffles across and drops a back of a length ball on the leg side, Elton rushes to field
left alone outside off on a length
mid off is deep, mid off is wide, just as well, as Tamim smashes a half-volley straight to him, it is struck so hard that it pops out of his hands
tries to belt another full one down the ground, but mid off gets to it, Meth is really asking for trouble with these gentle half-volleys
and produces a nippy yorker out of nowhere, Tamim jams down his bat on it
he is getting a touch impatient now, shuffles about and tries to dab one going across past point, cannot beat that man
now he gets the single, drops the length ball softly in front of point and Ashraful responds well
tries to slap a widish one past extra cover but does not find any timing on the shot
nudged off the pads as he floats it full with the angle
again on the leg stump, tucked away behind square
full delivery clipped emphatically off the pads but midwicket pulls off a fine diving stop
plonks front foot out and pushes a fullish one back to the bowler
that has flown to the third man boundary, full and wide outside off, he goes after it, and gets a thick edge, third man is pretty square
wide again but on a length, he finds some bounce and Ashraful lets it go
tossed up full around middle and leg, pushes forward to defend
flighted full around off stump, he reaches out and pushes to long off
hurrying on from wide of the crease, he gets forward and blocks
down the track but finds midwicket with the push
flighted full around off stump, dips on him as he presses forward in defence
poor all around, too wide down the leg side from wide of the crease, Taibu cannot get to it in time, Mutizwa cannot stop it running back from short fine leg
leaves the crease, takes it on the full and pushes to long on, tidy over ruined by those wides
Ashraful takes on Elton and finds the boundary, down the track and lifts a length ball over extra cover and wide of Waller at sweeper cover

Elton has struck and has taken off in celebration, bends it in with the angle on a length close to off, Ashraful goes feeling forward for it and gets an edge through to Taibu, just walked in to a prod
shot! gets well forward to a full and wide one and drives along the ground to sweeper cover
pushes from the crease with an open face towards point
uses the angle from round the stumps to tuck a back of a length ball to long leg
solid front foot drive, that has crashed in to Utseya at extra cover, Rahim looking in superb touch
tossed up slowly around leg, pushed back towards the bowler, Tamim playing with more caution now
pushes forward with a straight bat and picks up a single to long off
Rahim is brimming with confidence,  comes with lots of assurance down the track and eases a full one to long on
pushes a flighted one back to the bowler
fires it in full on the pads as he sees Tamim make room and dance down the track, he mistimes the shot towards long on
very full delivery dug out towards midwicket
back of a length ball guided towards point
inside edge as he looks to drive a full delivery from middle stump, goes towards long leg
crouches forward and eases a full delivery back to the bowler
Elton is working up some pace, gets it right in the blockhole and Rahim jams his bat on it
steals a quick run with a nudge in front of midwicket
too much on the pads from round the wicket and he picks him to long leg
slowly tossed up, he pushes it wide of extra cover but Sibanda gets across quickly and runs down the ball with a slide
widish one eased towards point off the back foot
played towards midwicket
pushed down the track off the front foot
nudges one off leg stump in front of square leg
full on leg and he gets down to sweep to long leg
flat but on off stump, punched off the back foot to midwicket

Price has struck right away, Tamim trying to take him on with a lunging slog sweep, Price does not give it a lot of air, pushes it through, and Tamim smashes it straight to midwicket, Price celebrates with lots of words, that is a huge wicket
that has turned a lot, Shakib was shaping up for the cut off the back foot but it came in sharply towards his pads
worked with the turn towards square leg from a fuller length and he is away
comes down the track and eases it to long off
leaves the crease but Price pushes it through flat and he has to block
shortish and turning in a long way from outside off, he creates some room outside leg and cuts wide of short third man
drives a full delivery flighted high in the air to long off
played with the turn from outside off to midwicket
quicker and fuller close to off, defended off the front foot
Rahim takes him on with a skip down the track, and a swish over midwicket with the turn
tries to push down the ground from a full length but midwicket gets to his left to field
flat and quick one on off, he stays in the crease and pushes towards cover
fullish one middle and leg, he plays it towards midwicket
flight this time around middle, he gets low and forward to defend

dropped sees a shortish one and goes on the back foot to cut it, it  got on to him quickly, Mpofu was a bit late to come forward at short third man and it fell just short of him as he tried to dive forward belatedly, Mpofu was pretty clumsy in starting to move forward
Shakib hammers the slog sweep, and gets the connection alright, it is fetched from beyond the deep midwicket boundary
nudged behind square leg off the pad
flights the off break close to off, it turns in a bit and is worked in front of square leg
the running has been frenetic and nervy today, non-striker takes off as Shakib nudges towards short fine leg, there was no run there
short and turning away outside off, cracked to sweeper cover
tosses it up high, he does not go after it, allows it to dip and eases it to long on
too flat, too short, too much time, Shakib goes back and slaps it wide of sweeper cover
better, fuller around leg and pushed towards midwicket
gets down on a knee for the sweep and gets it in front of square off a full delivery
nudges off the pads towards long leg
he is looking pretty solid, gets out of the crease and drives hard to long on
shortish and hurrying on outside off, he gets back and gets the cut through point
cuts in the air again, but this time it falls well short of short third man
full delivery outside off driven down with the turn to long on
gets down the track and pushes a flighted one back to the bowler
goes back and guides one from off stump through point
pushed through quicker and fuller and he blocks it off the front foot
backs away again and takes it from middle stump and gets it towards point
fine shot, he is dropping it just a bit short, and they are exposing the stumps by backing away, working so far for them as Shakib gets the cut past point
hit hard down the ground towards long off
turning away but from leg stump and he shuffles across to tuck it to long leg
well forward and smothers a tossed up one outside off
down the track, pushes it through flatter and quicker, he has to block it
backing away to a shortish one turning on to middle again, and cuts it past point
goes down and forces the sweep in the air over the square leg umpire, there is a man in the deep
they are taking the spinner for some easy runs, turning in on leg stump and he picks it through square leg

Rahim has given it away after looking so good, pushed through flat and shortish with the angle from round the wicket, Rahim looks to sweep it over square leg but gets it straight to that man, it got on quickly to him and he was not in a great position for the shot
tossed up full and he pushes it back, Price goes scrambling to his left to stop it
pushed back down the track
gets forward to ease a fullish one to long on
backs away and flashes the cut off middle stump, gets it through point, there is a direct hit but Shakib is well in
shortish and turning in, again he makes room and cuts wide of sweeper cover

he is taking too many chances with the cut, this one hurries on towards middle, and he just gets bat on it in time, non-striker wanted the single and had charged half way up the track before coming back
pushes a fuller one down the track
gets around this one and drives to long off
uses the turn to whip off the back foot in front of square leg
pushed through full on leg stump, and he sweeps it to deep square leg
lunges forward and wrists a fullish one with the turn from outside off past the non-striker to long on
punches a length ball off the back foot towards point, now Shakib wants the single and charges out before he has to get back
flashes off the back foot towards short third man
pushes a full one back to Price
width outside off from a shortish length, he cuts hard straight to deepish cover

Price has struck again, he has kept building up the pressure with those dot balls in this over and the newcomer has cracked, Hom saw one bowled fuller and lunged hard at it, but swung it straight to deep midwicket
pushes uncertainly in the air but there is no one around short leg and Price fields
pushes a slow delivery tossed up wide of extra cover
tossed up outside off and he smothers it in forward defence
gets down the track and pushes back to the bowler
there is no slip for Utseya, and he gets an edge through that area as he goes back to flash a cut to a not-so-short turning delivery
pushes it through quicker and he blocks it off the front foot
pushed away on the off side
gets a tickle off the pads to one going down the leg side
finding some bounce and zip from a length as he puts in more effort, hits the high part of the blade as he pushes forward
plays out one fired in full towards midwicket
blocked off the front foot
keeps him on strike again, he cannot nudge it wide of square leg
tosses it up and he goes hard at the drive, inside edge rolls towards square leg, Price persisting with all those men in the circle
Utseya gets quickly to his left and stops a firm push down the track
nudged off the pads towards square leg
sees some width outside off and cracks the drive to sweeper cover
cannot get the push past midwicket off a full delivery
tossed up slower and he nudges it towards square leg
fired in quickly and very full, appeal for leg before, would have gone down leg with the angle it seemed
going across him from a length, too close to off, but he makes some room and cuts through point

that will help Bangladesh a bit, some air from Price around middle, and he goes down on the knee to smash the slog sweep beyond deep midwicket, someone tries to catch the ball but tumbles backwards over his chair
reverse paddle now from a full length outside off stump, gets it quickly towards the third man boundary, Mutizwa hares after it and manages to pull it back
on the leg stump and nudged through square leg, by the time the man from the deep gets to it, they take the second as well
turning on to the pads again, and he takes another single behind square leg
tossed up on the pads but he cannot tickle it past short fine leg
high full toss, he is surprised a bit and pushes it back to the bowler
punched off the back foot towards long off
nudges with the turn straight to square leg
scoops it from well outside off stump behind square leg
too much on the pads, and picked in front of square leg
flattish one pushed back down the track
they haven't got the line right to Shakib, again on the pads and he happily tucks it through square leg
pushed through on off stump, he punches towards extra cover
angled on the pads and worked towards square leg to bring up the 150
angles it full across the let-hander who pushes off the front foot towards covers
nudges in front of the wicket on the leg side but Taibu gets around to it to prevent the single
shuffled and works a a flat delivery straight to square leg
tries to force an angled fullish one down the ground, cannot time it
tries to dab towards third man from close to the body, from middle stump, chops it towards point
a touch on the pads and he tucks to deep square leg
get bat around front pad to work with the angle on the leg side
pushed towards point off the front foot
tries to open the face and run it towards third man, does not time it at all
low full toss, again around the pads, worked through square leg
pushed through full on off, defended on the off side
tries to paddle-scoop from well outside off stump, gets it in the air and it falls short of the man running across from short fine leg
Shakib continues to back away and crack the cut from middle stump
Price gets to his left and fields this push off a fuller one
fired in fuller on the pads with the angle, worked towards square leg
down the track now and bashes a length ball towards sweeper cover
now Mahmudullah leaves the crease and tries to slog him over midwicket, gets it in the air but short of the man in the deep
flashes the cut from close to the body, he has done fine with that shot today, past point and some work for third man
he is going after everything now, full and widish outside off, and he belts it off the front foot to sweeper cover
tries the short ball, he wasn't expecting it, and allowed it to go over his head in the end
pushed towards point off the back foot
Shakib walks down the track and lifts him in to the gap between long off and sweeper cover
Mahmudullah walks down the track as well, Meth bowls it on a length and he chops it on the off side close to the pitch, Shakib steals the single though
flashes with tremendous bat speed and gets a length ball down to third man
well bowled, he gets it in to the blockhole outside off stump, and he cannot run it down towards third man
moving away from a length outside off stump, and he misses the dab again
breaks free this time, it has been a struggle for him, but now he gets a low full toss on the pads and flicks it through square leg, there is deep midwicket but it is too far from him
and floats it down the leg side from round the stumps
on the pads now and helped with a neat swing down to long leg
on target, right on the middle stump from a length, he works it towards midwicket
now he bangs it wide down the leg side to the right-hander, Taibu tries to appeal for caught-behind but he cannot prevent the wide call
keeps the shortish delivery down through square leg with a swivel and a swing-pull
fires it in full around middle with the angle, he flicks it towards deep square leg
down the track and attempts to slog him down the ground, gets a thick edge that falls short of third man
Shakib gets to another ODI 50 with a tuck towards square leg, what would Bangladesh do without him? Not much at all
that's a gift, full toss on the pads and Shakib helps it wide of midwicket
has that carried? Shakib got another one on the pads and flicked it in the air, but it fell just short of Taylor at midwicket
slanted widish with the angle outside off, left alone
poor bowling, they have fed Shakib on the leg stump repeatedly, shortish on the pads again, and he pulls it behind square leg
smashes it from the crease to the man at sweeper cover

almost trickled on to the stumps, it was fired in full, and he got an inside edge as he jammed down his bat on it, the ball started to roll towards the stumps, but Mahmudullah recovered quickly to try and get his bat between stumps and the ball, replays show that the ball actually hit the stumps but could not disturb the bail
skips down the track and belts a low full toss straight to extra cover
short ball guided to short third man for a quick single
they take two now, nudged off the pads through square leg, by the time Waller gets to it, they have enough time to get back
dropped, simple chance, Mahmudullah was surprised by a short one dug in to the body and tried to pull it awkwardly, it looped straight to Price at short fine leg, and went through his hands
chopped from close to off stump towards point
high full toss now, he works it through midwicket
this partnership is hurting Zimbabwe, Mahmudullah abandons the crease, walks down and belts a fullish one wide of long off
he is looking better now, goes hard at another full delivery outside off and gets it towards sweeper cover
another one full and on the pads, he tickles it past a diving Taibu
and yet another full delivery on the pads, I wonder whether it is impossible to get it around his off stump, Shakib nudges it behind square leg and gets back for the second
full and on leg stump again, worked in front of square leg
full and wide outside off stump, crashed off the front foot to sweeper cover
coming in after pitching close to off, worked behind square leg
width outside off and slapped away to sweeper cover
jeez, they are really letting it slip here, now he hurls one full and wide down leg
and now a shortish and wide offering outside off, he cracks it off the back foot, fortunately for mpofu, straight to sweeper cover
fullish one outside off pushed off the front foot towards sweeper cover
gets the single in front of point now
they wanted the single, they will get it off an overthrow as Shakib tried to get back  after pushing towards cover who missed with the throw
starts off with a low full toss on the pads, where else, and is worked behind square leg
sees some flight outside off stump and goes violently after it, and cracks it to the deep cover boundary
fired in full, he bends the knee and swings wide of long on
take that now, high full toss on the pads, Shakib has been accepting these gifts all along today, and swings it happily to the deep square leg boundary
goes down for the paddle now, and gets it fine on the leg side
gives his intentions away by standing outside leg stump and threatening to come down the pitch, he fires it in full well outside off and MAhmudullah has to reach out a long way, almost falls over
comes in from middle, shuffles and nudges behind square leg off the pads for an easy couple
low full toss, around middle and leg, squeezes it down to long leg
stands a long way outside leg stump, and Mpofu sees that, and bowls it full in the blockhole close to off stump, Shakib tries to reach out but misses
tries to fire it in full again, expecting him to back away, but this time Shakib hasn't moved, it ends up around his pads and he swings it wide of short fine leg
keeps overdoing the angle and now he ends up wide down leg
tries to squeeze the full delivery past extra cover but cannot time it well
opens the face and squirts a length ball towards short third man
whips a full delivery from middle and off down to long on
down the track and hits a fullish one down to wide long off
well done, right in the blockhole on off stump, MAhmudullah gets bat down in time from his huge backlift to keep it out

whoa, he has got a boundary but he was looking to take evasive action initially, or was he, Taibu certainly was as Meth bowled a high full toss, Mahmudullah got down and managed to get the scoop off the high part of the bat fine on the leg side, Taibu will be thankful he connected, or he was straight in the firing line
pushed towards covers for a single
Shakib is gone, Meth goes full on leg stump from round the wicket, Shakib walks across trying to scoop him over short fine leg, misses and leg stump is uprooted
comes in slowly after pitching on a length outside off, he cannot work it away and Mpofu fields

shot! down the track, gets under the pitched up delivery and lofts it high over the bowler, one bounce, in to the boundary, and that is 50 for him, he was scratchy at the start but hasn't thrown it away, the dropped chance helped
now he gets cheeky, gets front pad across, bends the knee, and picks a full delivery from leg stump fine past a diving Taibu with a neat little paddle-scoop
low full toss, hit down to long off
full delivery, and he shuffles to push it down the track, Mpofu fields
works a full toss straight to midwicket
hit hard down the ground and Meth seems to have hurt himself as he gets a hand to it
gets it right in the blockhole, well done, he jams it away on the off side
moves about in the crease but cannot get the low full toss wide of long on
another one in the blockhole as he looks to walk down the track, cannot do much with it, Meth doing really well here given his lack of pace
he manages to get this one away, low full toss on the stumps, and he arches back to smash it between deep midwicket and long on

this is nasty for Meth, he is down, there is blood all around his mouth, it was a full toss smashed straight back at him, got too quickly on to him, and he had no chance to get out of the way, copped it in the face close to the mouth and went straight down on the ground, he has even lost a tooth, he is not moving, and will have to be stretchered off

inn2.comm: moving away from a length far outside off, left alone
bowls it from wide of the crease on the pads, and he nudges it behind square leg
solidly forward in defence to a straight length ball close to off
wider outside off stump, not much movement, left alone
finds some away movement this time but from way outside off
holding its line outside off stump after being angled in, he shoulders arms
well bowled, closer to off stump, and Sibanda gets forward to push towards point

gone right away, Rubel strikes first ball, Taylor pushing away from his body, a problem he has had throughout this series, holding its line some way outside off from a length, no need to do anything with it, but Taylor goes poking limply and Rahim gleefully snaps up the edge
similar delivery, if a bit wider outside off, and Masakadza does not go pushing at it, takes a step out and allows it to go past
pushed off the front foot towards point
taking off from short of a length but quite a long way outside off, Masakadza does not go after it in the end
gets well forward to a pitched up ball and defends, the pace is up from Rubel in the first over
sprays another wide outside off stump
gets it on target now, back of a length around middle, he shuffles to tuck it towards midwicket
well bowled, moving away from a fuller length outside off, inviting the drive, he shoulders arms instead
good delivery from Rubel, similar to the one that got Taylor, angled in, drawing hims forward, and then moving away outside off stump, beaten
moves forward to a pitched up ball and drives towards short extra cover
drives loosely outside the line as Shafiul bends it back in with the angle from a length outside off
gets behind this one to push on the off side
pings mid off with a crisp drive off the front foot to one that is pitched up
moving away this time but from well outside off, he will not go after those
stands tall and looks to thump the cut through cover but mistimes the shot off a shortish and wide one
that has gone, stands tall again and punches off the back foot, short again, and he has time to hit it past extra cover
opens the face to run a length ball towards third man

that is as good a hook as you'll ever see, he has absolutely hammered it over the deep square leg boundary, short ball getting big in him, but he swivels outside the line and cracks it off the middle of the bat
back of a length and he plays it out on the leg side
going for the blockhole, ending up on the pads and he times the flick past short fine leg
Shafiul gets another one to hold its line outside off stump, he gets forward and across to push it towards point
tries to punch off the back foot but there is not much width on this one and it is coming in with the angle too, mistimes towards point
lovely delivery from Shafiul, he has got that straightening movement going nicely outside off stump, coming in with the angle and then suddenly going straight on, left alone wisely
now has him in trouble with one that comes back in after pitching outside off, inside edge on to pad saves him
Sibanda tries to walk down the track and loft him over mid on, almost hits it straight to that man, drops just short
walks outside the track again, he is getting impatient, looks to force it on the off side, thick inside edge on to pad
there was room outside off for the back-foot punch, but he hit it straight to extra cover
coming in now from outside off a bit, he gets forward and defends
tries to work a shortish one with an angled bat, gets it towards mid on
opens the face to get this length ball wide of point
goes for the drive off the front foot, almost hits it straight to shortish extra cover
gets it down to third man for a single
Sibanda is in some serious touch, he has walked down the track and this time the connection is so well that he has lofted a length ball high over deep midwicket
back of a length close to the body, chopped wide of the keeper on the off side
stays in the crease and uses the angle on the length ball to whip to short midwicket
slower one from Shafiul, but he waits on it, stays beside it and dabs it to third man

crack! another example of how well he is hitting them, on the front foot as he sees width outside off, bends the knee, opens the face and gets it behind backward point with a graceful swing of the blade
pushed down the track
full delivery around middle and leg, whipped in front of square leg
short and smashed straight to short extra cover off the back foot
pushed through fuller, and he gets forward and bends to defend towards point
fullish around middle now, he is forward in defence
quicker now, he stretches out to block
that has turned sharply, past the outside edge, he was not committed fully forward and that is what has probably saved him as it has just taken off from around off stump
gets away with a short one well outside off stump, that should have disappeared, instead he goes hard after it and finds point
and again, fuller but still wide outside off, comes forward and belts it straight to point
gets the single now as he whips a shortish one towards midwicket whose dive parries the ball towards the non-striker;s end
superb delivery, Sibanda manages to dig it out as it comes in the blockhole around leg stump
that has gone right through mid off, it was hit hard off the front foot, but should have been stopped
another forceful drive races towards Razzak at mid off, this time he gets body behind the ball and manages to stop it
flat delivery straightening outside off stump, hit hard towards covers
stands in the crease and smashes a length ball straight to extra cover
tries to take a step out and push firmly but finds Shakib now
finally manages to get it away, off the back foot wide of long off, the throw comes in low to Shakib and hits him low on the leg, he winces in pain and shouts towards the fielder
Sibanda picks up this shortish one early, goes back and whips it past midwicket instantly, superb timing
tossed up full, he gets forward and pushes back to the bowler
down the track but he drops it a touch short and on the legs, he has to defend
pushes a fuller one down the track
short, flat and outside off, he rocks back and thumps it in front of point, easily done
pushed forcefully down the ground to long off
Sibanda uses the feet to Razzak, what's new, down the track, to the pitch and drives in the air with a straight bat past mid on
going back to a length ball that hurries on towards middle, could have been tight, but he manages to punch towards extra cover
sharp, sharp turn, that has surprised him, he was shaping up to push it down the ground but it zoomed away outside off, and he got an edge towards short third man
turning delivery pushed off the back foot in to the off side
gets the single down the ground to long on
well bowled, angled in from wide of the crease on off, and turning away past the edge after drawing him forward, too good
gets still further forward to this one and defends solidly
solid drive off the front foot now but it finds extra cover
short and angled in, his pull finds deep midwicket now, talk about picking out the fielders with precision
pushed towards midwicket off the front foot
fired full in the blockhole, jammed down the track
kicks from a length as it turns, he is surprised as he pushes it back towards the bowler
fuller and angled in, he goes for the sweep but cannot connect well
appeal for leg before, as this one slides in with the angle, he pushes outside the line for some turn, looked to be going down leg
well done, gets down low to his right to stop a firm push off a full delivery
goes back and gets a shortish one angled in past midwicket
tossed up full and he eases it straight to extra cover, now then

Sibanda is gone, off a mistimed pull, not for the first time in the series, rocked back as he saw one angled in short in to him, but got the pull off the back of the bat towards short third man who took the dolly
he is bowling superbly, angled in and draws him forward in defence, and turns past him, RAhim has the bails off but the back foot was in
pushed down the track off the front foot
pushes off the front foot wide of cover for a single
Rahim shouts and shouts, it was a close one as Taibu got forward to one that went straight in with the angle and struck him on the pad in front of off, not given
latches on a to a shortish one and puts it away through point
down the track now and works it to midwicket, has to get back quickly as the throw comes in
again he leaves the crease and pushes wide of mid on now for a single
that has gone, short and sitting up, he rocks back  to hammer it over mid on
tossed up around middle and leg with the angle, pushed down the track
turning away from a length, he gets out to push towards covers
is that off the bat, no off the shoulder as Shakib gets it to turn across the batsman, falls short of slip anyways
hit in front of square leg for a single
cracked off the back foot to sweeper cover
he is troubling them, uncertain with some turning a lot, jabs at this one as it hurries on from a length, inside edge towards square leg
flat and short, going towards middle, whipped off the back foot to midwicket
pushes a tossed up ball towards point
too short again, on the pads too, worked away square for a single
down the track, almost yorks himself but gets the flick away wide of midwicket who puts in a dive to his right but cannot stop it
gone leg before, this time the appeal is upheld, shuffling forward to one coming in with the angle, struck in front of middle and leg, that would have hit leg stump, and he is sent on his way
this one turns, bites, kicks outside off, and goes past the outside edge as he pushes from the crease
turning away from leg stump, he smothers it in forward defence

could not get plumber that that, Taibu trying to drag the sweep from off stump, Shakib angles it in full from wide of the crease, pitched around middle and off, Taibu misses with the big swing, and that was hitting off and middle, more middle than off
pushes well forward in defence to a length ball
in the air but that is beyond short fine leg, and deep square cannot get to it in time, Waller going for the sweep and getting a top edge
fires it in on leg stump, he flicks it in front of square leg for a couple
pushes forward pretty limply, and the thick edge runs past slip
the one that hurries on with the arm, he went back in the crease and only a fortunate inside edge saved him
better, pushes well forward and gets it towards point
another inside edge, of the thicker kind as he presses forward
tries to push towards covers and get off strike but there is no run there
fired in flat and full around off, squeezed out towards point
gets bat in front of pad and manages to smother this one
fullish on the pads, tucked away towards square leg
played out towards square leg
turning in slowly from outside off, he gets forward and nudges towards short fine leg
fuller around off, dead-batted off the front foot
pushes it flat and short as he sees him come out, pushed towards midwicket
that has turned in a long way from outside off, can't expect those, no way to work it away, only an inside edge saves him
dabbed off the back foot wide of point, he wanted to cut it initially then checked his shot, was in the air for some time
pushed in front of square for a single
Mutizwa hits out, and gets it away fine, full delivery and he heaves it over midwicket
reaches out to push towards extra cover
lovely one, turning across the outside edge from off stump as he goes back hoping to defend
quicker and fuller, he gets forward to defend on the off side
full delivery outside off pushed off the front foot towards cover
swats a flat delivery turning in from outside off past midwicket
tries to paddle it away fine on the leg side, cannot get much on it
pushed off the back foot to midwicket
that will go, down the track comes Mutizwa, and lofts, gets it wide of mid off
pushed towards long on
floated up fullish outside off, left alone
pushed down the track off the front foot
pushed away in front of point
slanted in full with the angle, he pushes it back to the bowler
going on with the angle on the pads, worked square on the leg side
paddles it from leg stump, gets it away towards square leg
shuffles across outside off stump and pulls a shortish one through midwicket, long on runs and parries the ball to deep midwicket with the dive
beats him outside off with one that does not turn much
opens the face to push towards point
tries to heave it over square leg, gets it away fine on the leg side along the ground
gets the single with a push in front of point, shades of Dilshan in Nasir's bowling style
played out to midwicket with the turn
pushes away from the body at one that turns a long way from off stump, beaten
gets a boundary now, shuffles across and swings one angled in hard over short fine leg
low full toss eased down to long on
full delivery outside off driven along the ground to sweeper cover
reaching out to a tossed up ball and driving it to sweeper cover
that has gone through short third man, it was widish outside off and he got the cut towards short third man who got to his right and dived but let the ball through
pushed in the air on the leg side, appeal for a run-out, Waller slowed down as he approached the other end for a sharp single, direct hit from midwicket but he is in as replays show
he is shuffling way across and getting outside off to work turning deliveries on the leg side, finds midwicket now
fuller one nudged with the turn to square leg
he gets away this time, shuffled across and tried to work a flat delivery with a bit of a jab, got it in the air off an edge, but over midwicket
does it again, he jabs at deliveries as he tries to force them away on the leg side, gets this one through midwicket
straight push down the ground to long on for one
forced off the back foot from short of a length towards extra cover
close to the body outside off as he shuffles and flashes it wide of third man, fumble down there gives another run
he is trying to bend it back in from a fuller length, Waller gets forward and defends on the leg side
gets some bat on this one as it homes in full one middle and leg, gets it down to long leg
thick edge now as he squirts a short of a length ball down to third man
good pace from Rubel, hits the bat high and hard from a length, he pushes in front of point for a single
tosses it up full outside off, he reaches out to drive to long off
strikes pad as he tries to work him with the turn on the leg side, struck just outside the line though
uses the feet and drives with the turn to long on
stretches forward and finds long off with the push
touch flatter, nudged to short fine leg, Waller wants the single and is a long way out but Razzak stumbles as he shapes to throw and Waller is able to get back
hit in to the leg side for a couple
gets on his toes and keeps a rising ball down towards point
squeezed out to point off the front foot
worked in to the leg side
sharp short ball, well bowled, Waller gets out of the way as it get big outside off
smashing front foot drive to a pitched up ball outside off, gets it to sweeper cover
lunges forward and across and squeezes a fuller delivery towards point and goes, "wait, wait"
pushed on the leg side off the front foot
presses forward and gets this one wide of cover for a quick single
gets forward and eases it down to long on with the turn
pushed back down the track
that will be four, full down the leg side and Waller swings it past the man at short fine
squeezed out to backward point off the front foot
sharp single, Waller watches the ball go towards mid off off a firm drive, is late to take off but get to the other end safely
thick inside edge as he jabs at a back of a length ball angled in
well done, avoids the bouncer as it rises close to off stump, bends the knee and lets it go past
nicely done, pushes across to one bowled slower outside off, inside edge trickles back on to pad
and there it arrives as well, not quite up in the ribs, but around waist height, but he shuffles across and wristily helps it to the deep backward square leg boundary
blocks a pacy length ball down the track
turning in from close to off, tucked away in front of square leg
fuller and around off stump, nudged in to the leg side
shuffling across and whipping it in front of square leg from outside off
pushed back down the track

gone! superb work from extra cover, and guess who it is, it is Shakib Al Hasan, low full toss hit hard, he thought it had enough to go past extra cover, but Shakib was around there to put in a big dive to his right and stop the ball, Mutizwa was more than half way down the track by then, and it was too late to get back as Shakib fired in an accurate throw to Rahim, can any performance get more all-round than that?
inside edge as he goes back to try and cut against the turn, ball rolls down the track
Rahim takes one going down the leg side and screams for caught behind, ultimately the umpire gives it as wide
pushes in front of cover and takes off, fielder advances and he is sent back
pushed behind point with an open face
inside edge on to pad as he looks to push a tossed up ball towards extra cover
reaches out to push a well flighted ball to point
nudged off the pads in front of square leg
loops off the pads in the direction of short leg, who is not there, but Rahim gets there, and surprise, surprise he does not squeal out an appeal, it was that obviously off the pad
fine diving stop at extra cover off a front foot drive
pulls a shortish one behind square leg
pushed through quick outside off, he gets forward to block
down the track and pushes in front of mid off for a single
forward and tucks a turning one past midwicket

the tamest of tame dismissals, shuffled across to a short delivery turning in, seemed to be in two minds whether to crack it over midwicket or play it out, in the end did something in between and pushed it straight to the man there
pushed through full outside off, inside edge as he tries to push it towards cover
slows it down outside off and he gets forward to squeeze it towards point
reaches forward and pushes a fuller one to the bowler
tossed up and turning away quickly, he jabs it away on the off side
pushed down the ground to long off
flighted full around off, well forward to smother it
his technique is working for him at the moment, shuffles outside off and whips it over midwicket with the turn
pushes solidly forward in defence
hits him on the body as he goes back and it bounces and turns in

direct hit, overthrows, collision, batsman going down, all happening, it was nudged in front of midwicket who found the non-striker;s stumps, Utseya was just in and also got four more as the ball ricocheted to the boundary, he then collided with the bowler, and went tumbling in to the ground
pushed on the off side, they are throwing themselves around in the field, extra cover dives to his left and rips the throw in, Utseya has to put in a big dive of his own as well at the striker's end
bowled quicker and turning in on leg, nudged towards square leg

crack! that resounded around the ground as Waller gets to his 50 with a smashing drive off the front foot that goes through sweeper cover, that was struck really hard and Kayes did not have much time to move to his right
opens the face and pushes towards point
pushed in front of point for a single
loud appeal for leg before, Shafiul is sure he has his man, angled in and strikes him in front of middle and leg, could have gone down leg, but close enough to merit a big shout
pushed in to the off side for a single
hurls it in full with the angle, flicked to midwicket
goes hard at the sweep from outside off and gets it in front of square leg

that is it for Waller and for Zimbabwe I say, down on the knee and tries to slog-sweep over midwicket, gets it straight to the man in the deep, been an entertaining innings, and has brought Zimbabwe back a shade but he has given it away
worked off the back foot to midwicket
turns in from off, he plays it towards midwicket
pushed through quicker, and he gets forward to defend
another one goes, Utseya departs now, shortish one, he tries to go back in the crease and pull it through square leg, tame top edge, swirls up tamely and shot fine leg is waiting under it
length ball forced off the front foot towards extra cover
all over for Zimbabwe, that is the game for Bangladesh, Meth is not going to come out to bat, widish delivery, he goes after it from the crease and hits it to backward point
